column3: “If you're looking for a head" high
column4: this likely isn't the strain for you. That said
column5: I feel this may be the most intense body high I've ever experienced. 20 minutes after smoking this you'll forget you have a physical presence. I'll be back for more of this...”"

column3:
“5 stars if you are looking for an out of  this world body high .

I have 3 herniated discs in my back and a spinal stenosis , this alleviated all of the pain , Was so relaxed , so at peace .

No head rush speedey thinking paranoiia at all , this also calmed my anxiety 


10 stars for anxiety and pain relief !!!”

“This medicine saved my girlfriend from an epileptic seizure more than once after a few puffs her spasms stop completely. I enjoy the taste and the high but love this strain for its ability to give relief to those who need it.”

“review for blueberry hashplant c02 bhang cartridge from pure life new mexico. tested at 58.53% THC, 0.32% CBD, 0.31% CBN, 2.30% CBG, and 1.03% CBC. the best cartridge I've tried so far up to date. taste like fine hash or some very good dry sift kief, with a high of fruit. very nice medicine for pain, insomnia, appetite, and a nice clear head change. very highly recommended!!!🔥👍😸💣🚬.”

“Hubba, hubba, a very powerful strain. One of those strains where you feel the effects almost immediately. Looking at the Blue Hash under magnification revealed a very healthy and abundant 
amount of trichomes. Taste is good with a little expando action. A very steep but calming high, it seemed to make the world a bit sunnier.”
“Definitely one my favorites strains, perfect for a good night sleep after a long day.”
“Nice and mellow!!”
“Most strains including indicas keep me awake but this does not, so nice for evenings. Overall a great strain.”
“Classics review (aka retrospect): this is the definition of chill”
“Very frosted. Wasn't the moat potent stone bit worth a try.”
“Absolutley loved this strain. From the aroma to the taste. Unfortunately I havent been able to find it again.  This strain needs to be enjoyed by all at least once in your life.”
“Nice mild high, looks very frosty and has a great fruity taste.”
“Just picked it up. great taste probably because I'm hitting a vape. can really taste all the bud better with the vape... The high is a little out of the body" feel. overall good green.”"
“Great nighttime meds, or after work wind down..helped great with restoring my appetite..cooks well to with raw coconut oil!!”

“I acquired some as a free joint at the dispensary I visited when purchasing Corleone Kush. As you can see by the two star rating, I did not care for it. The cerebral buzz was practically non-existent, which is something I like to see in all indica / indica-dominants. Instead it even made me feel a little unhappy,. However, the body high is pretty decent. I smoked this joint three times before smoking it all up and gi...”

“Strong body high. Starts off with a bit of euphoria and then transitions into strong relaxation. After smoking you’ll have a about 25 minutes to get into a position you will most likely stay for the rest of the high. What I don’t like about this strain is the very dry mouth and eyes. Occasionally it also makes me paranoid.”

“I am reviewing BlueGhost #1 which is a cross of bluehashplant X LA Confidential. ..this is a crystaled wonder with that hashy blue aroma. .!the taste is so good definitely heavy hash influenced tones super high me enjoy this medicine from CDXX Boutique in Shelbyville Mi”
“Just picked it up. great taste probably because I'm hitting a vape. can really taste all the bud better with the vape... The high is a little out of the body" feel. overall good green.”"
“AMAZING strain ! Great pain relief, wonderful deep relaxation. Happy vibes seem to flow right out of this stuff ! Wonderful aroma and smooth smoke. Just an all around perfect thing !”
“good weed but I feel the hash plant over powers the blueberry flavor a little bit.”
“Great for relaxing after work, and with pain..”
“great taste and very relaxing chill hungry high!”
“Great strain. Pretty potent but clear high. Personally, I've gotten the best effects from vaping this weed since the vape high tends to be clearer for me already.”

“This wonderful medicine hits fast and hard, first a quick kick to the head, then a warm hug around the body, resting up and letting you - rest up

I would/will buy this again”

“Strong body high. Starts off with a bit of euphoria and then transitions into strong relaxation. After smoking you’ll have a about 25 minutes to get into a position you will most likely stay for the rest of the high. What I don’t like about this strain is the very dry mouth and eyes. Occasionally it also makes me paranoid.”
“Amazing would recommend it to anyone with perminant injury”
“fire🚀”

“Very heavy body stone. Mind is clear and thinking without much anxiety. 
Everything feels great and I am at peace right now. Heavy classic deep indica shit right here.”
“great for insomnia, and stress relief, also handled my pain well. could last a lil longer, but nice dense and brittle buds, also great for infusing raw organic coconut oil as it does have some cbds”

“I acquired some as a free joint at the dispensary I visited when purchasing Corleone Kush. As you can see by the two star rating, I did not care for it. The cerebral buzz was practically non-existent, which is something I like to see in all indica / indica-dominants. Instead it even made me feel a little unhappy,. However, the body high is pretty decent. I smoked this joint three times before smoking it all up and gi...”
“Great high, mine has a citrusy smell to it with a lot of trichomes. Bed time strain for sure”

“Perfect if you're looking for a subtle high. Doesn't seem to put me out but my body feels great! I prefer more of a put you on your ass head high though so I don't recommend this if that's what you're going for.”
“Light chill”
